data.text: Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɓɔɛni pɔ̀, é ɠɛ mà:
«Ɗa ʋe, zunui, GALA gooi wo, è ɠɛ ma:
Mazɔlɔɔ foloi maa ɠa na ɓuɠa,
Kɔɔi ɠa ɓɔi Ezipete yooi zu,
Etiyopi, ta Pute, ta Lude, naa ʋɛɛ nuɓusɛ zupui naati pɛ ba, Liɓi ɓalaa,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa:
Ezipete ɠa ɠɛ ga teʋebai zu, é leʋe teʋebai zu yooiti pɛ ba,
Ta suɠwɛɛ naazu ga nà ɠa gè ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI,
Naama voloi, keelaiti nà ti leʋe, ta li ɓatoi zu,
Maliɠii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa:
Tɔ-o, ná-nuɓusɛiti-yo,
Nà ziɛ wolai Nile ma ɓekegiti fɔ su,
Maliɠii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa:
Nà Ezipete yooi ɠoloɠolo lɛkpɛmaʋɛ nu yeezazu ʋelei,
Nà yiiɠula Sin laalɔɠɔma, Ezipete ná-poluzeigi,
Nà abui lo Ezipete yooi ʋa,
Won nu niinɛiti ta Pi-Bezɛte geleiti
Foloi la toa Taapanɛse,
Nà Ezipete lukpɔɠaaleʋezu.
Kona puugɔ maazu ɠilasiɛi (11) ma alu mɔungi ma volo lɔfelasiɛi ma, Maliɠii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɓɔɛni pɔ̀, é ɠɛ mà:
«Ɗa ʋe, zunui, gè Ezipete masagi Falaɠɔn yeei ɠaleni, gaa la ɠilini é ʋa ʋalo, é la laani kpazavɛlɛa zu, nii a kɛ é zɛbɛ zɔlɔɔ, é zoo é boɠa zɔkpɔi ʋili.
Maliɠii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa: ‹Nà wuzeɠezu Ezipete masagi Falaɠɔn laalɔɠɔma. Nà zee felegɔiti galeɠalezu, é la nɔ ga zɔi galeai, kɛlɛ ma ʋagɔi ɓalaa, gè ná-boɠa zɔkpɔi ɠula zea, é loo.
Naazu nà Ezipete nuiti faza zii ɠiligiti saama, nà ti zuvaza zou mɔinmɔin kiligaa zu.
Nà ta ɓɔ Ɓaɓilɔne masagi ná-zobogi ʋa, nà, nà ɓɔɠɔi nà-boɠa zɔkpɔi la zea. Falaɠɔn nii gè zeei zuɠaleɠalezu, toɠa yɛ ɓalasu zili nui ya, eyɛsu é za.

Ungo, nà zobogi ve Ɓaɓilɔne masagi ya, kɛlɛ Falaɠɔn yeei zu ɠa ɓɔlɔ. Ta suɠwɛɛ naazu ga nà ɠa gè ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, siɛgi zu gè nà-boɠa zɔkpɔi laazu la Ɓaɓilɔne masagi ya, é ɗa pili Ezipete yooi laalɔɠɔma.
Nà Ezipete nuiti faza zii ɠiligiti saama, nà ti zuvaza zou mɔinmɔin kiligaa zu. Ta suɠwɛɛ naazu ga nà ɠa gè ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI.› »
